files.patch:
@@ -95,0 +95,3 @@ +

If this doesn't work, you can also try +File -> Import -> Existing Projects into Workspace +instead.

@@ -161,0 +164,3 @@ +

If doing so results in an error, you can also import the JDK via +File -> Import -> Existing Projects into Workspace as +a last resort.

@@ -72,3 +72,6 @@
-`Import source`
-click on the directory `ide\eclipse`, which can be found in the build output
-folder.
+`Import source` click on the directory `ide\eclipse`, which can be
+found in the build output folder.
+
+If this doesn't work, you can also try
+`File -> Import -> Existing Projects into Workspace`
+instead.
@@ -177,0 +180,4 @@
+If doing so results in an error, you can also import the JDK via
+`File -> Import -> Existing Projects into Workspace`
+as a last resort.
+

@@ -3,2 +3,2 @@
-    <name>Java</name>
-    <comment>The official Java HotSpot Virtual Machine, Runtime Environment, and Development Kit</comment>
+    <name>jdk</name>
+    <comment>The HotSpot Virtual Machine, Runtime Environment, and Development Kit</comment>

@@ -38,2 +38,2 @@
-  # Use primary variant for defines and includes
-  JVM_VARIANT := $(JVM_VARIANT_MAIN)
+  # Use server as base for defines and includes
+  JVM_VARIANT=server
